@rendog
I found a neat way to get hermits to pay in the barrel.
This is based on a trick I learned from Pixlriffs.

Since light gray stained glass looks like empty inventory slots, you rename a bunch of them as "please pay in the barrel"
Above your stock chest, you have a hopper that drops these in the moment an inventory slot becomes available.
When a hermit takes items out of the chest, a new light gray glass pane pops in, with the name "please pay in the barrel", so when they try to put something in that slot, they see that the slot is occupied by something called "please pay in the barrel" 
Haven't tested it yet, but it should work.
#PayInTheBarrel
